9647.<center>エテーネの民の姿を取り戻した あなたは\n大地の箱舟のチカラを借:
You have regained your form as one of
Ethene. With the help of the Ark of the Earth,
you can now travel to the past.

9648.<center>ただし 行けるのは エテーネの血を引く\nあなたが 人間の姿のと:
However, you can only go in your human form,
as the blood of Ethene flows within you.

9649.<center>さあ お行きなさい。\nエテーネの民 <pc>よ。\n与えられた:
Now go, <pc> of Ethene. Fulfill
the mission that has been bestowed upon
you...

9651.「何をボサッとしてるんだ！！\n 早く こっちへ！:
Don't just stand there!! Get over here,
quickly!

9652.「やけどは ないな。\n 無事で よかった……。:
Looks like you didn't get burned. Thank
goodness...

9653.「君は…… 新しい 逃れ人のようだな。\n ならば あの レイダメテスのことを\:
You... seem like you're new to these parts.
I guess you haven't heard about Reidametes,
then.

9654.「レイダメテスは 地上のすべてを焼き尽くす\n いつわりの太陽……。あれが 空に:
Reidametes... the false sun that consumes
everything down below... whenever it appears,
we can't let its light touch us!

9655.「レイダメテスが現れるようになって\n すでに １年……。今では このグレン城が:
It's already been a year since it first
appeared... and now this place, Glen Castle,
is the last place we can hide...

9656.「行ったか……。\n 主よ。今日一日の命を 感謝いたします。:
It's gone...? Oh, thank heavens. We live
another day.

9658.「ここは エルジュぼっちゃんの お部屋です。\n ぼっちゃんなら シオドーア様に:
This is Erju's room. He just left to go and
see Theodore.

9659.「ささっ 出てください。\n 勝手に 知らない人を部屋に入れたら\n 私が ぼっ:
But you must leave now. If I let a stranger
into his room without permission, the young
master will definitely scold me.

9660.「おお そなたは 新しい逃れ人か。: Oh, so you're the new refugee?

9661.「ふむ。名は <pc>というのか。\n 私は シオドーア。\n このグレン城の民:
I see. So you're called <pc>?
My name is Theodore. My duty is to lead the
people of Glen Castle.

9662.「このグレン城までの道中は \n さぞ 厳しいものであっただろう。\n よくぞ:
The journey here must've been quite arduous.
I'm glad you were able to make it here safely.

9663.「世界の大部分が 炎に焼き尽くされた今\n この城は 我らの 最後の希望のとりで:
As most of the world has been consumed by
flame, this castle is our last hope. As
humans, we must all help one another.

9664.「逃れ人よ ご安心なさい。\n 世界の終わりなど 決して 訪れません。\n 私た:
However, rest assured that the world will not
end. That is the reason we have all gathered
here.

9665.「ここにいる魔法使いたちは グレン城を守る\n 光の防壁を作るために 集まってく:
Our mages have joined together to erect a
barrier of light to protect the castle. And...
Is there something you need to ask me?

9666.「……なに？\n 破邪舟をあやつる 魔法使いを探している？:
What? You're looking for a mage who can sail
the Sacred Ship?

9668.「……いや 失礼した <pc>。\n 悪気は ないのだ。:
My apologies, <pc>. I meant no
offense.

9669.「残念だが 破邪舟師ベルンハルトは 死んだ。\n レイダメテスに単身乗り込み 炎:
Bernhardt, who was a Ship Shaper, has
unfortunately died. He sailed alone into
Reidametes and was consumed by the flames.

9670.「……人の話を聞かぬ 愚か者には\n じつに似合いの最期であった。:
A fitting end for a fool who couldn't
listen...

9672.「……エルジュよ 客人の前だ。わきまえよ。: Erju. We have a guest. Mind your manners.

9673.「光の防壁など ただの時間かせぎだ！\n 災いの源 レイダメテスを断たねば\n:
This light barrier is a waste of time! If we
don't stop Reidametes directly, then we're
all done for!

9674.「だから ボクが 破邪舟の術を継承し……:
So, I will inherit the ability to sail the
Sacred Ship...

9675.「そして…… レイダメテスを破壊しにいく。:
And then... Reidametes will be destroyed for
good.

9677.「親子そろって 英雄気取りか？\n そんなに ベルンハルトのように\n 犬死にし:
You're too much like your father, Bernhardt!
Are you just as eager to die?!

9678.「だまれ！ 父の死を ぶじょくするな！！:
Shut up! Don't you dare mock my father's
death!

9679.「……ならば 好きにしろ。\n 破邪舟の一族の血など 途絶えたところで\n 誰も:
Then by all means... do as you like. No one
will care if the Sacred Ship bloodline
finally dies off.

9680.「今のが 死んだ破邪舟師の せがれだ。\n まだ 何も知らぬ 幼き子供よ。:
That is the son of the dead Ship Shaper I
mentioned. He's still young and ignorant.

9681.「破邪舟師を探していたのなら あいにくだが\n エルジュは 術を継承していない。:
If you are looking for a Ship Shaper, Erju
cannot help you. He has not yet inherited the
ability to sail it.

9682.「この世界には それぞれに異なる術を持つ\n 四術師と呼ばれる者たちがいる。\n:
There exists Four Sorcerers in this world,
each knowing a different art. The Ship Shaper
is one of those arts.

9683.「四術師は それぞれの術が 心正しき者に\n 受け継がれるよう 継承には 残る３:
The Four Sorcerers have sworn an oath that each of their arts must be passed on to one of a righteous heart. That succession requires
a ritual by the remaining three sorcerers.

9684.「エルジュは 継承の儀を受けるため\n ３人の術師のもとへ 行くつもりのようだが:
Erju plans on going to the other three
sorcerers for the succession, but there is no
way they'd accept a novice such as him.

9685.「気にかかるなら 様子を見てくるがよい。\n あいつの部屋は この城の １階にあ:
If you're worried about him, you can go see
him in his room on the first floor.

10142.「ぼっちゃん！ ひとりで行くなんて\n ムチャすぎますよ！\n お願いですから:
Young master! You can't go alone! I beg you,
please calm down!

10143.「……お前 さっき\n シオドーアと 一緒にいたヤツだな？\n ボクに 何か用が:
You were with Theodore just now, weren't you?
Do you need something from me?<yesno><close>

10144.「人の部屋を訪ねておいて 用がないわけが\n ないだろう？ さあ 早く言え！\n:
If you don't, then why would you just barge
into someone's room for no reason? I don't
have time for this!

10145.「……はあ？ なんだって？\n 破邪舟の術が 途絶えないようにするために\n ５:
Huh? What? You came from 500 years in the
future to make sure the art of the Ship Shaper
is properly passed down?

10146.「……なるほどな。\n お前も ボクをバカにしにきたってわけか。:
Oh, I get it... So you came here to make
a fool out of me, too, huh?

10147.「お前なんかに 言われなくても\n 破邪舟の術を 途絶えさせたりするものか。:
I wasn't going to let the art of the Sacred
Ship die out whether you said so or not.

10148.「術の継承くらい ボクには たやすいことだ。\n お前たちは 新たな破邪舟師が助:
Passing on the art is a cinch. Just wait here,
and the new Ship Shaper will save the day.

10151.「あ……あなた！ ぼっちゃんを 気にかけて\n 来てくれたんですよね？ だったら:
Oh... you! You came here out of concern for
the young master, right? Will you help him?!

10152.「ああ 突然 すいません……。\n 申し遅れましたが わたしゃ ベルンハルト様に:
Oh, sorry for being so hasty...
I should have said so sooner, but I'm Kai.
I used to work for Master Bernhardt.

10153.「あなたには 事情をお話しします。\n ふた月ほど前 ベルンハルト様が\n レイ:
Let me tell you what happened. About two
months ago, Master Bernhardt set out to
destroy Reidametes...

10155.「心配いらない。私は 必ず戻る。\n それまで エルジュのことは 頼んだぞ。:
Don't worry. I'll be back. Please take care of
Erju for me until then.

10158.「誰かが 戦わなくてはならない。\n そして 私には そのためのチカラがあるんだ:
Someone has to fight... and I have the power
to do so with the Sacred Ship.

10160.「その目で 見ていてくれ。\n そして すべてが 終わったら \n みんなで レ:
Please watch me... and when this is all over,
everyone can finally go back to Lendersia.

10161.「私は レイダメテスを破壊し\n この世界に 平和をもたらしてみせる。:
I will destroy Reidametes and bring peace to
this world!

10162.「この大いなる災厄を 必ず食い止めると\n 皆に 約束しよう！:
I promise to you all that I will stop this
madness once and for all!

10163.「誰もが ベルンハルト様の勇気をたたえ\n その約束を信じました。:
Everyone praised Bernhardt's courage and
believed in his promise.

10164.「けれど ベルンハルト様は\n そのまま 帰らぬ身となり\n 約束は果たされなか:
But Bernhardt never returned, and his promise
never fulfilled...

10165.「そしたら とたんに\n 国中のみんなが 手のひら返したように\n ベルンハルト:
In response, everyone who had once believed
turned their backs on Bernhardt, calling him
a liar!

10166.「ぼっちゃんは お父上を笑った大人たちを \n 見返してやりたいんでしょう。:
The young master wants to get back at all
those people who mocked his father.

10167.「だから 破邪舟の術の継承のため\n この城の北東…… 四術師のひとり\n ヤク:
So to inherit the ability to use the Sacred Ship, he went to go see Yakuru in her settlement to the northeast. She is one of
of the Four Sorcerers.

10168.「でも……ぼっちゃんは 魔物と戦ったことすら\n ないんです。どうか ぼっちゃん:
But the young master has never been in a real
fight with a monster before.... Please help
him! I'm begging you!

10170.「この城の北東にある集落には 四術師のひとり\n ヤクル様が暮らしています。おそ:
Northeast of the castle lives Yakuru, who is
one of the Four Sorcerers. The young master
is likely headed that way.

10171.「強がっていますが 本当は ぼっちゃん\n 魔物と戦ったことすら ないんです。:
He is strong, but the truth is... he's never
fought a monster before.

10172.「どうか ぼっちゃんのことを\n 助けてやってください。お願いします！:
Please, help the young master. I'm begging
you!

10173.「破邪舟師ベルンハルトの息子 エルジュ！\n ならわしに従い 継承の儀を受けにき:
I am Erju, son of Ship Shaper Bernhardt. As
tradition, I've come to receive the succession
ceremony!

10174.「四術師のひとり ヤクルよ。\n 破邪舟の術の継承のことは 父から聞いている。\:
Yakuru of the Four Sorcerers... My father has told me about inheriting the ways of the Sacred Ship. We must begin the succession
ceremony immediately.

10175.「あなたが ベルンハルトの……。\n そうですか。よく来てくれましたね。:
You must be Bernhardt's... I see. I'm glad
you've come.

10176.「しかし 順序というものを わきまえなさい。\n 要求をクチにする前に まず\n:
But you should know how these things work.
Isn't there something you should say first
before spouting off with demands?

10177.「レイダメテスに故郷を追われ 私たちが\n この地にやってきたとき 人間たちは\:
When Reidametes drove us from our home, the
humans took control of our scarce source of
water.

10178.「この集落の者たちは あなた方人間に\n グレン城を追い立てられ この荒野で\n:
After you humans drove us out of Glen Castle,
everyone here is now starving and thirsty.

10179.「そうか。それは気の毒だったな。\n だが あいにく それは\n ボクには 関係:
I see... that's quite unfortunate. However,
that is none of my business.

10180.「今は とにかく 四術師の役目を果たしてくれ。\n ボクが 破邪舟師の術を継承す:
For now, it's best if you just fulfill your
role as one of the sorcerers. Once I am Ship
Shaper, you'll have nothing to worry about.

10181.「……あなたは 何も わかっていません。: You don't understand anything, do you?

10182.「……ですが よいでしょう。\n では 四術師の誓いの通り あなたが\n 破邪舟:
...very well. As one of the Four Sorcerers,
I am under oath to test your worthiness of
becoming the Ship Shaper.

10183.「あなたの父は 目の前で困っている人を\n 放っておくことなどしなかった。\n:
Your father would never ignore a person in
need. Show us that same compassion.

10184.「……何が 言いたいんだ？: What are you trying to say...?

10185.「この集落には 水が足りないのです。\n ほんの少しでも お城の水を分けてくださ:
There is little water to go around here. If
you can share even a little water from the
castle, many lives will be saved.

10187.「……順序を わきまえていないのは\n そっちの方ではないか？:
I think it's you who doesn't know how these
things work...

10188.「ボクは 使いっぱしりにきたんじゃない。\n 継承の儀を 果たすために\n わざ:
I didn't come here to be some errand boy.
I came here to take the succession ceremony!

10189.「取り引きをしたいのなら\n そちらが先に 役目を果たしてもらおう！:
If you want my end of the bargain, you'll have
to fulfill this duty first!

10190.「……あなたは？\n エルジュの知り合いの方ですか？: ...And you are? An acquaintance of Erju?

10191.「なんで お前が来てるんだ……？\n どういうつもりか知らないが\n これ以上:
Why are you here...? I don't know what you
want with me, but please stop following me
everywhere.

10192.「……ったく あのエルジュとかいう\n ガキにも 困ったもんだ。\n あの調子じ:
Good grief... that Erju kid is something else.
With his attitude, he won't be taking the
ceremony anytime soon.

10193.「なあ あんた。あのガキのことが\n 気になるなら アイツの代わりに\n ヤクル:
Hey, you... If you care about that kid so
much, why not help out Yakuru instead of
him?

10194.「グレン城から 水を持ってくるなんて\n 人間のあんたなら 楽勝だろ？:
Getting water from Glen Castle should be no
problem for a human such as yourself,
right?

10195.「あなたは 自分の父親のことを\n 何も 理解できていないようですね。:
You don't seem to understand anything about
your father.

10196.「……ボクは 間違ってなんかいない。\n 継承の儀が果たされるまで\n ここから:
I've made no mistake. I'm not leaving until
I fulfill the succession ceremony.

10198.「また お前か。\n ボクのことは ほっといてくれと言ったはずだ。:
You again? Didn't I tell you to leave me
alone?

10200.「そうでしたか。\n エルジュの代わりに あなたが……。: I see... Instead of Erju, you...

10202.「ありがとうございました 親切な人間の方。\n この水のおかげで この集落の\n:
Thank you, kind human. How many people here
will be saved by this water, I wonder?

10203.「……エルジュ こちらへ。\n 継承の儀を 始めましょう。:
Erju, come this way. We'll begin the
succession ceremony.

10205.「あなたのためでは ありません。\n 私たちと あなたのことを想って行動してくれ:
I'm not doing it for you. It's all because of
this person, who helped us by acting on your
behalf.

10206.「理由は わかりませんが この方も\n あなたが 破邪舟の術を継承することを\n:
I'm not sure why, but they seem to really
be hoping that you'll inherit the Sacred Ship.

10208.「これで あなたに 破邪舟師の\n 基礎となるチカラが そなわったことでしょう。:
You now have the basic skills required to
become a Ship Shaper.

10209.「……チカラが みなぎってくる。\n これが 破邪舟師のチカラ……。:
I feel a flow of power... this must be the
Ship Shaper's power...

10210.「残る継承の儀は あとふたつ。\n まずは 南のゲルト海峡の橋に滞在している\n:
You must complete the other two ceremonies.
If I were you, I'd first go visit the Pukulipo
sorcerer staying at Gert Strait to the south.

10211.「言われなくても そうするさ。\n それでは ボクは失礼する。:
You don't have to tell me. Anyways, I'll be
off.

10213.「なんだ？ 礼なら 言わないぞ。\n 互いに 務めを果たしたまでだからな。:
What? I'm not going to thank you. We've
already done each other's duty.

10214.「私には 礼などいりません。\n ですが チカラになってくれた その方には\n:
I don't need your thanks. But don't you think
you should thank the one who helped me?

10215.「……そいつが 勝手にやったことだ。\n 頼んだ覚えもないことに 礼は言えない。:
They did that on their own. I'm not going to
say thanks for something I never asked for.

10216.「親切な人間の方……。もし よろしければ\n これからも エルジュのことを\n:
Human, who is kind... if you can, would you
please continue to keep an eye on Erju?

10217.「あのままでは あの子は\n またすぐに 壁に ぶつかるでしょう。:
With how things are now, he will definitely
have trouble again.

10219.「こんな場所に 立て続けに\n 客人が来るなんて……。:
To have guests coming here one after the
other...

10220.「ああ 失礼。申し遅れた。\n 私の名は フォステイル。\n 今は ワケあって:
My apologies for being late. My name is
Fostail. There's a reason I am here.

10221.「ところで どうして こんな所に？\n キミも 四術師のひとりである私に 何か用:
What is your reason for being here? Is there
something you need from me?

10222.「エルジュ……？\n ああ あの破邪舟師の少年か。: Erju...? Ah, that Ship Shaper boy...

10223.「確かに すこし前に ここに来たよ。\n 私に 継承の儀をするよう 頼みにきたの:
He came here a while ago and asked me to
perform the succession ceremony.

10224.「彼の申し出は もちろん引き受ける。\n だが その前に 彼には 試練を兼ねて\:
I will accept his offer, of course. But before
I do that, I asked him for a favor as my
way to test him.

10225.「その頼みとは ランドンクイナという魔物が\n 時折落とす 氷鳥のはねを手に入れ:
I asked him to get me an Icebird Feather,
which is sometimes dropped by a monster
called Apeckalypse.

10226.「彼は その話を聞くと\n すぐに ここを飛びだしていったよ。: As soon as I told him, he took off.

10228.「私は 危険だから 一緒に行こうと\n さそったのだが なぜか 彼は\n ひとり:
I offered to go with him as it's quite
dangerous, but he was insistent on going
by himself.

10229.「今度は 誰の手も借りないと……。: He said he had to go alone this time...

10230.「ここに来るまでに 何があったか知らないが\n 彼の かたくなさに 私は不安を覚:
I don't know what happened to him before he
came here, but his stubbornness made me feel
quite uneasy, like that of a storm...

10231.「どうやら キミは 旅慣れているようだね。\n すまないが エルジュに\n 手を:
You seem to be well-travelled. Sorry to ask,
but could you lend Erju a hand?<yesno><close>

10232.「エルジュのことを 気にかけて\n ここまで来たんだろう？\n ならば……。:
You came here because you care for Erju,
right? In that case...

10233.「ありがとう 助かった。\n それでは この海峡の岩屋の 南西にある\n ランド:
Thank you for your help. If you would, please
head to Landonfoot, located southwest of this
strait.

10234.「エルジュと チカラを合わせて\n その地に生息する ランドンクイナを倒し\n:
You and Erju will have to work together to
defeat the Apeckalypses that wander the area
and obtain an Icebird Feather.

10237.「また お前か。今度は なんだ？: You, again? What is it now?

10238.「なに？ ボクと協力して\n 氷鳥のはねを 手に入れるよう\n フォステイルに:
What? Fostail asked you to help me find an
Icebird Feather?

10239.「ふん。お前の協力なんて 必要ない。\n これくらい ひとりで やってみせるさ。:
Hmph. I don't need your help. I can do this on
my own.

10240.「お前は お前で\n 勝手に 氷鳥のはねを手に入れて\n フォステイルの所へ 持:
If you're so inclined, you can get an Icebird
Feather and bring it to him yourself.

10241.「ま どうせ ボクが先に手に入れて\n 向こうに 戻っているだろうけどな。:
But I'm sure I'll get it first and beat you
to it anyway.

10242.<pc>は フォステイルに\n氷鳥のはねを 渡した！:
<pc> handed the Icebird Feather
to Fostail!

10243.「ありがとう 助かった。\n これで パルカラス王国の人々を救える……。:
Thank you for your help. With this, the people
of Palkuras will surely be saved...

10244.「ところで エルジュは一緒じゃないのか？\n まだ ここには戻ってきていないが。: Wasn't Erju with you? He hasn't come back yet.

10245.「ああ。エルジュ おかえり。\n キミも 氷鳥のはねを 持ってきてくれたのか？:
Ah, Erju. Welcome back. Did you bring an
Icebird Feather, too?

10247.「そうか……。\n 氷鳥のはねを 手に入れることは\n できなかったのか。:
Oh, I see... you weren't able to get your
hands on one, then?

10248.「必要なものは 手に入ったんだろう？\n それでも まだボクが 何かしないと\n:
You got what you needed, right? But don't I
still need to do something for you in order
to perform the succession ceremony?

10249.「……ふっ まあ いいだろう。\n <pc>に免じて\n 継承の儀を 始めること:
No need to worry. I will begin the ceremony in
honor of <pc> here.

10250.「……よし。\n これで キミに 破邪舟を創りだす魔力が\n そなわったはずだ。:
There. You now have the magical power
necessary to create the Sacred Ship.

10252.「だが 今のキミでは まだ\n 破邪舟を 自由に あやつることはできない。\n:
But you are not yet ready to control the
Sacred Ship. There is still one more
succession ceremony left to complete.

10253.「そんなことは わかってるさ。\n だが 今のボクでも 破邪舟が創れるんだな？:
I know that. But I can still create a Sacred
Ship, even now?

10254.「よし！ 一度 試してみるとしよう！\n フォステイル 外に来てくれ！:
Okay! Let's give a shot! Fostail, follow me
outside!

10256.「いいかい？ 精神を集中し\n 創りだす舟を イメージするんだ。\n そして 魔:
Are you ready? Focus your mind, and imagine
the ship that you want to create. Then,
unleash all of your magical power.

10259.「うっ… ぐぐ……。\n ダメだ…… これ以上は……。\n げ… 限界だ……。:
Urgh.. I can't... hold it... it's too...
much...

10260.「はじめてにしては 上出来さ。 \n さすがは あのベルンハルトの\n ご子息と:
Well done for your first try. I've no doubt
that you are the son of Bernhardt.

10261.「ふたりとも 今日は疲れただろう。\n この岩屋で 休んでいくといい。:
You both must be quite exhausted from today.
Why not rest here for the night?

10263.「まったく つくづく おかしなヤツだな。\n 頼んでもないのに どこまでも つい:
You're quite strange, you know that? You've
followed me everywhere even after I told you
not to.

10264.「……父さんは レンダーシアの大国\n グランゼドーラお抱えの 術師だったんだ。:
My father was a sorcerer in service of Gran Zedora, one of the great powers of Lendersia. He had many apprentices and was well
respected.

10265.「ボクは そんな父さんの 誇り高き破邪舟師の\n 血を引いてるんだ。できないこと:
I'm proud to be a descendant of my father,
an amazing Ship Shaper. I thought there was
nothing I couldn't do. And yet...

10267.「……そう <pc>ね。\n お前らしい 変な名前だな。:
<pc>, huh? It's a strange name,
but I guess that suits you.

10268.「……ボクは 今まで 他人の苦しみなんて\n 考えたこともなかった。人のために:
Until now, I had never thought about the suffering of others. I never understood how my father felt when he risked his life for the
sake of others.

10269.「でも…… 今は なんとなく わかる気がする。\n 誰かを助けたいと思った 父さ:
But... now I sort of understand. The way my
father felt when he wanted to help someone.

10272.「……そうか。\n ランドン山脈も 通り道に なっているのか。:
I see... so the Landon Mountains are also in
its path...

10273.「見ろ……。山頂に 触れそうだ。\n レイダメテスが すこしずつ\n 下降を 始:
Look... It's almost touching the summit.
Reidametes is starting to slowly descend.

10274.「光の防壁では これ以上 レイダメテスを\n 防ぎ続けることは できないだろう。:
The barrier of light can't keep it away any
longer. Glen Castle doesn't have much time
left, either.

10275.「……戻ろう。明日に そなえなくては。\n もう ゆっくりしては いられない。:
There's no time to lose. We should head back
and prepare for tomorrow.

10276.「……エルジュ。最後の術師は\n ランドンフットの北西部にある 荒野の集落に\n:
Erju. The last sorcerer is a man named
Gamilgo. He should be located in a settlement
in the northwest part of Landonfoot.

10277.「………だが ガミルゴは 人間であるキミに\n 簡単には 手を貸してくれないだろ:
However... as a human, Gamilgo will not be
so easily swayed by your words.

10278.「心配は 無用だ。\n フォステイル 世話になったな。:
No need to worry. I appreciate your help,
Fostail.

10280.「な……なんだよ 変なこと言ったか？\n さそわなくたって どうせ ついてくるん:
D...did I say something funny or something?
Even if I say no, you'll still follow me,
won't you? We don't have time to waste.

10281.「エルジュには これから先\n さらなる苦難が 待ちかまえているだろう。\n ど:
Erju has many more hardships awaiting him.
Please be there to support him.

10282.「人間め！ なんの用だ！\n ガミルゴ様は 人間とは話さん！:
Humans?! What do you want!? Master Gamilgo
does not speak with your kind!

10283.「人間よ！ 今すぐ 立ち去るのだ！ \n さもなくば 我が剣で……。: Leave now! Or else you'll know my blade's...

10285.「人間どもが ここに来やがるとは\n なかなか いい度胸じゃねえか。\n いった:
You humans have some real guts coming here.
Just what do you think you're doing here?

10286.「術師ガミルゴと お見受けする。\n 破邪舟師ベルンハルトの息子 エルジュ。\n:
So you are Gamilgo. I am Erju, son of Ship
Shaper Bernhardt. I've come to receive the
succession ceremony.

10287.「……ああ。お前が エルジュか。\n ベルンハルトが よくお前の話をしてたぜ。\:
...Ah, so you must be Erju. Bernhardt used
to talk about you quite a lot. Said he was
real proud of you.

10288.「そうか 継承の儀をやってほしいのか。:
I see... So you'd like me to perform the
ceremony... Is that right?

10291.「なるほどな。フォステイルの言う通りだ。\n 人間には チカラを貸したくないって:
Looks like Fostail was right. They want
nothing to do with humans, do they...

10292.「だが ガミルゴ。ボクは 急いでいるんだ。\n 継承の儀を行うための条件があるな:
But, Gamilgo... I have no time to waste right
now. If there's any conditions I must fulfill
for the succession, just hurry up and tell me.

10293.「きさま！ なんだ その態度は！:
You little punk! You've got some nerve!
Show some respect!

10294.「……条件なら あるぜ。\n 大事なモノを取り返してほしい。\n だが お前に:
...There is one condition. I'd like something
important given back to me. The question
is...can you do it?

10295.「取り返してほしいもの……。\n それは 我が祖国 グレン城だ。:
And that thing is...Glen Castle.
My homeland.

10296.「グレン城……我が祖国だと？\n 何を言っているんだ。\n あそこは ボクたち人:
Did you just say your homeland...? What's that
all about? Glen Castle belongs to the humans!

10297.「人間め！ よくも ぬけぬけと！: You damn human! How dare you!

10298.「……ああ。なんにも知らねえんだな。\n やれやれ 人間は 汚ねえぜ。\n 都合:
...Yes, I did. You really don't know anything, do you? *sigh*... Humans really are disgusting. Anything they find inconvenient
they just sweep under the rug.

10299.「おい 半人前の破邪舟師。\n お前に 教えてやるぜ。\n オレたちが 人間を信:
Hey, half-Ship Shaper. I'll tell you
why we can't trust humans.

10300.「あのグレン城は もともとオーガの城だったが\n 世界の大半が炎に焼かれた時 オ:
Glen Castle originally belonged to the Ogres.
When most of the world was burned to the
ground, we opened it to other races as well.

10301.「そして 皆の協力で なんとか生活していた。\n だが ある時 人間どもが\n:
With everyone's help, we managed to get by.
But it didn't take long for humans to show
their true colors.

10302.「水の配分に不満をいだいた人間どもは \n いきなり グレン城を乗っとりやがった:
The humans were not satisfied with the
distribution of water, so they quickly took
over the castle and drove everyone else out.

10303.「バカな。そんなことが………！: That's ridiculous. There's no way that's true!

10304.「オレたちを こんな辺境に追いやりやがって\n 自分たちが困ったら 協力しろとは:
They drive us to this remote place and then
ask us to cooperate when they're in trouble.
All they know is greed. Don't you agree?

10306.「オレは 人間に いくさをしかけるぜ。\n そして グレン城を この手に取り戻す:
I'm going to wage war against those humans,
and take back our castle. You understand now?
Then get out of my sight!

10308.「今は 戦争などしている場合ではない！\n グレン城をオーガに返還するよう\n:
Now is not the time to fight! I'll convince
Theodore to return the castle to the Ogres!

10309.「ふっ。ずいぶん簡単に言うな 小僧。: Heh. You make it sound so easy, boy.

10310.「ボクは 本気だ。\n もう 時間がないんだ。: I'm serious. There isn't much time.

10311.「……おもしろい。その話 乗ってやる。\n 小僧ごときに 何ができるか\n 見せ:
Interesting... then I'll take you up on that
offer. Let's see what you can do, little man.

10312.「お前が グレン城をオレたちに返還できたら\n オレも いくさをやめよう。\n:
If you return Glen Castle to us, I won't
wage any wars. And I'll make sure the
succession ceremony is done right.

10315.「<pc>さん ありがとうございます。\n ぼっちゃんに ついていてくださったん:
Thank you so much! So you did accompany the
young master after all, right? Ah, I'm so glad
to see you're both safe!

10316.「シオドーアに会いに 戻ってきたんだ。\n 用が済んだら また すぐに出発する。:
I came back to see Theodore. As soon as that's
finished, I'll be on my way again.

10317.「カイ…… 父さんは ボクらに\n 何も話してくれなかったけど……。:
Kai... my father never told us anything,
but...

10318.「きっと 父さんは 知ってたんだ。\n 水不足に苦しむ エルフやウェディのなげき:
He must have known. The grief of the Elves and
Weddies over the lack of water... the anger of
the Ogres who lost their castle...

10319.「ぼっちゃん…… 急に どうしたんです。\n いったい なんの話ですか？:
Young master, what's this all of a sudden?
What are you talking about?

10321.「いずれ話す。今は 時間が ないんだ。\n 行こう <pc>。:
I will tell you eventually, but I don't have
time right now. Let's go, <pc>.

10322.「<pc>。こんな所で\n 油を売ってるヒマはない。\n 早く シオドーアに 会:
We don't have time to just stand around
here. I have to go see Theodore right
now.

10324.「私には 事情が サッパリなんですが……\n どうやら ぼっちゃんは あなたに\:
I'm not really sure what's going here, but...
I can see that the young master has somehow
opened up to you.

10325.「あの……どうか ぼっちゃんのこと\n よろしく お願いします。: Um...Please, take good care of him.

10327.「荒野の集落にいる オーガたちから聞いた。\n この城は 彼らの城だったんだな。:
I heard from the Ogres in their settlement...
This castle used to be theirs, didn't it?

10328.「このままでは 戦争が始まる。\n リーダーのガミルゴは オーガたちを率いて\n:
If things stay like this, war is going to
break out. Gamilgo is going to lead the Ogres
here to take back their castle!

10329.「……わざわざ それを伝えに 戻ったのか？:
You came all the way back here just to tell
me that...?

10330.「ご苦労なことだが あの程度の数の\n オーガなど 恐るるに足らん。\n 降りか:
That's quite unfortunate, but their numbers
are nothing to fear. We'll be prepared to
fight whatever they bring to us!

10331.「バカな……！！\n すぐに この城を オーガに返還するんだ！\n 今は 種族同:
No...! You must give this castle back to the
Ogres right now! This is no time for different
races to be fighting one another!

10332.「お前が 私に説教か？\n まるで ベルンハルトのようなことを……。:
You're now lecturing me? You sound just like
your father...

10333.「確かに お前の言う通り 私は\n このグレン城を 武力で奪った。:
Yes, you are correct. I took this castle by
force.

10334.「そして 水を独占し 人間以外の種族の\n 多くの者を死に至らしめたのも 私だ。:
It was also I who seized control of the water,
causing many of the other races to die. But
can you really blame me?

10335.「残された水は わずかだった。\n あのまま 何もせずにいれば\n 共倒れになる:
There was very little water left. If I had
done nothing, then we'd all be doomed to
perish.

10336.「私は 人間をたばねる者として\n 同族を守ることを優先した。\n 理想より大事:
As humanity's leader, I prioritized protecting
my people. There was something more
important to me than ideals.

10338.「大事なものがあるのは 誰だって同じだ！: We all have things that are important to us!

10339.「もう一度言う！ 城を返還しろ シオドーア！\n ここは ボクたち人間の城ではな:
I'll say it again! Return the castle,
Theodore! It does not belong to us!

10340.「父と同じで ものの頼み方も知らんのだな。\n 要求があるのなら まず頭を下げよ:
Just like your father, you have no idea of the
proper way to ask for things. If you have a
request, you must bow to me, Erju.

10341.「お前の子供じみた正義感など 聞きたくもない。\n だが それでも 人に何かを頼:
Your childish sense of justice... I'm tired of
hearing it. If you want a favor from someone,
then show some proper sincerity.

10342.「この場で 私に頭を下げ 生涯の服従を誓え！\n 父とは違い 信念のためなら 誇:
Bow your head down to me and swear lifelong obedience! Show me that unlike your father, you can throw away your pride for your
convictions!

10344.「そんなこと できるものか！\n お前に服従など…… 死んでも誓わない！:
I'd never do such a thing! I'd never swear
obedience, for as long as I live...!

10346.「レイダメテスの下降は\n まったく 収まる様子が ありません！\n 我々の光の:
Reidametes' descent shows no sign of stopping!
Our barrier of light can't hold out any
longer!

10348.「見たことか！\n お前の計画じゃ 何も解決しない！\n 父さんは 間違ってなか:
You see?! Your selfishness won't solve
anything! My father was right all along!

10349.「うぬぼれるな！ たとえ 継承の儀を終えても\n お前の 破邪舟ごときでは\n:
Don't be so sure of yourself! Even if you do
manage to complete the succession, your Sacred
Ship will never reach Reidametes!

10350.「<pc>。ボクの部屋に来てくれ。\n ……考えがあるんだ。: Meet me in my room... I have an idea.

10352.「最後の継承の儀は あきらめて\n 今のチカラのまま 飛ぶんだ。:
I'll give up on the last ceremony and try
flying with the power I have now.

10353.「ぼ ぼっちゃん 何を……！\n それで 無事に戻ってこれると\n お思いなので:
Y-young master! What are you...?!
Do you really think this is a good idea?

10354.「ランドン山脈の山頂が レイダメテスの\n 通り道になっていたのを 覚えているか:
Remember how the summit of the Landon
Mountains was in Reidametes' path?

10355.「あそこから レイダメテスに向けて\n 破邪舟を飛ばすんだ。あの高さからなら\n:
I think if I fly the Sacred Ship from that
high up, I should be able to reach it.

10356.「前に 父さんが言っていた。\n あの炎の中にいる 守護者を討てば\n レイダメ:
My father once told me...if we strike down
its guardian inside, then Reidametes should
lose all of its power...

10357.「でも…… 君と旅して わかったんだ。\n ボクは非力で そんな相手を\n 倒せ:
But after traveling with you, I realized...
I'm not strong enough to beat something like
that... So...

10359.「レイダメテスに乗り込み\n その守護者と 戦ってほしい。\n ボクを信じて 手:
I need you to get into Reidametes and fight
its guardian. Please just trust me! I need
your help!<yesno><close>

10362.「中に どんな危険が潜んでいるか わからない。\n でも ボクは 必ずキミを助け:
I don't know what kind of dangers are lurking
inside, but I'll be there to help if you
need it.

10363.「いつの間にか ご立派に なられて……。\n それだけ 決意が固いのなら\n 私:
Well, if you're that serious about it...
I won't stop you.

10364.「どうか お気をつけて。\n ご武運を お祈りしています。:
Please do be careful... I wish you all the
best.

10366.「<pc>。ボクは 先に行く。\n ランドン山脈の山頂で 待っているからな。:
I'll go ahead and wait for you at the Landon
Mountains summit.

10368.「いや いいんだ。これは ボクが始めた戦いだ。\n ひとりで ランドン山脈へ行く:
No, it's fine. This is my fight. I'll go to
the Landon Mountains alone and I will defeat
that guardian.

10369.「じゃあな <pc>。\n 色々 助けてくれたこと……感謝してる。:
Goodbye, <pc>. Thank you for all
your help... I very much appreciate it.

10370.「いつの間にか ご立派に なられて……。\n それだけ 決意が固いのなら\n 私:
Well, if you're that serious about it...
I won't stop you.

10371.「どうか お気をつけて。\n ご武運を お祈りしています。:
Please do be careful... I wish you all the
best.

10373.「<pc>さん。\n どうか ランドン山脈の山頂へ行って\n ぼっちゃんを助けて:
<pc>...
Please go to the summit and help the young
master.

10374.「危険な場所ですが あなたと 一緒なら\n ぼっちゃんも大丈夫だって 思えるんで:
It's quite a dangerous place...but I know that
he will be safe if you're there with him.

10375.「きっと ぼっちゃんは あなたとの旅で\n いろんなことを 考えたのでしょうね。:
He must've thought about quite a lot on his
journey with you. He's suddenly become a
fine young man...

10376.「今の ぼっちゃんを ベルンハルト様に\n お見せできないことだけが 残念です。:
My only regret is that I can't show Bernhardt
how much he's grown...

10378.「じきに レイダメテスが やってくる。\n それまで ここで待とう。:
Reidametes will be here soon. Let's wait here
until then.

10379.「……<cs_pchero>。\n こんな時に 話すことでもないけど\n すこし:
I know this probably isn't the best time to
bring this up...but could you please
listen to me for a moment?

10380.「ボクは ずっと……\n 人に 認めてもらいたくて 必死だった。\n その気持ち:
All my life, I've always been desperate for
people to accept me. That was my only reason
for living, until now...

10381.「だから すこしでも反対されると\n ガマンできなかった。自分は 誰にも\n 必:
That's why I couldn't deal with even just a
little hostility. I began to think that no one
really needed me.

10382.「けど <cs_pchero>と旅をして\n すこし わかった気がする。:
But after traveling with you... I think I'm
starting to understand a bit better.

10383.「本当の誇りとは そんなことで失われるような\n 安っぽいものじゃない。:
True pride is not something that can be easily
lost over such trivial things.

10384.「……だから ボクは ボクに\n できることをする。父さんの遺志を継いで……\n:
That's why I'm going to do what I can. I'll
carry on my father's legacy... for the sake of
everyone who's suffering...

10386.「まだだ……。まだ高い……。\n あとすこし…………。:
Not yet... still too high... just a little
more...

10389.「はあはあ……！ <cs_pchero>！\n 今だ……！ 早く乗れ！:
Huff, huff... Now, <cs_pchero>!
Hurry, get on!

10392.「<cs_pchero>！ もう時間がない！\n すぐに 破邪舟を呼び出すから\:
We're running out of time! I'll call the
Sacred Ship once more! We must destroy
Reidametes this time!

10397.「我が名は ラズバーン。\n 神殿レイダメテスの守護者なり。:
My name is Razburn. I am the guardian of this
temple.

10398.「人間よ。冥土のみやげに 教えてやろう。:
Listen well, human. I shall indulge you as
a gift for entering the afterlife.

10399.「神殿レイダメテスは 死者の魂を糧としている。\n 地上を焼き尽くし 死んでいっ:
Reidametes Temple feeds on the souls of the dead. It scorches the land below, absorbing the souls of those who die to increase
its power.

10400.「いずれ チカラを満たしたレイダメテスは\n 我らの王を 生みだす。\n その時:
Once Reidametes is filled with energy, it will
give birth to our Lord. It is then that the
world shall enter an age of darkness.

10401.「人間よ。世界を救うなどという くだらぬ希望に\n おのれの命をかけたことを 後:
Human... you will regret throwing your life
away with your pathetic hope in saving this
world!

10402.「あの ベルンハルトとかいう魔法使いと\n 同じように きさまも 我が灼熱の炎で:
I will consume you and your soul with my
scorching flames, just like that fool of a
mage, Bernhardt!

10403.「ククククク……。\n 人間とは 愚かな生き物だ。:
Hmm hmm hmm... Humans are such foolish
creatures.

10404.「希望などという幻想に すがりおって。\n 後に残るものは 苦しみだけだというの:
They cling to the illusion of hope. Do you
still not understand that all that awaits you
is suffering?

10405.「二度と 立ち向かってこれぬよう \n 魂もろとも 焼き尽くしてやろう！:
I will burn you and your soul to ash, so that
you may never face me again!

10407.「我が 人間ごときに 敗れるとは……。\n きさまは いったい……。:
To be defeated by a lowly human...
What ARE you...?

10408.「……だが 手遅れだったな 人間よ。: However... you are too late, human.

10409.「この目で見ることは かなわぬが\n 我らの王の誕生は 先の世に\n 運命づけら:
I may not be able to witness it with my own
eyes, but the birth of our Lord was destined
to be! Gahahahaha!

10411.「間に合って よかった。\n 君が レイダメテスに行っている間に\n ガミルゴの:
I'm glad I made it in time. While you were in
Reidametes, I finished the succession
ceremony with Gamilgo.

10415.「見ろよ。すごい 出迎えだ。: Look... that's a pretty big welcome.

10416.「<cs_pchero>。いつかは疑ったけど\n 今なら 信じられる。\n 君は:
I'm sorry that I doubted you,
<cs_pchero>. But now, I believe you.
You really are from the future...

10420.「ああ ぼっちゃん！ 大丈夫ですか！？: Oh, young master! Are you all right!?

10421.「カイ……。ああ もう大丈夫だよ。: Kai... Yeah, I'm all right now.

10422.「レイダメテスは 海に沈みました。\n やりましたね <cs_pchero> エ:
Reidametes has sunk into the sea. You both did
wonderfully.

10424.「……<cs_pchero>よ。\n お前が レイダメテスへ飛び立った後\n エ:
<cs_pchero>. Erju came to me after you
headed into Reidametes.

10425.「エルジュは レイダメテスの中に入った\n お前を助けるために 継承の儀を受け\:
He said that he wanted to take the succession
ceremony and inherit the Sacred Ship in order
to help you.

10426.「そして…… そのために 深く頭を下げ\n 私に 生涯の服従を誓ったのだ。:
And for that... he bowed his head deeply and
pledged his lifelong obedience to me.

10427.「そのエルジュの姿を……\n 助け合い 信頼しあう お前たちを見て\n 私も よ:
Seeing Erju and you all helping and trusting
each other... that's when I finally realized.

10428.「人間だけが 生き残ればいいのではない。\n 我らは 種族を越えて 手を取り合い:
It was not enough for just us humans to
survive. We had to join hands across races
to fight this horrible crisis.

10429.「……私は お前たちに 賭けることにした。\n そして エルジュの継承の儀のため:
So I took a chance... I returned the
castle to the Ogres in exchange for Erju's
ceremony.

10430.「それで シオドーア様と ぼっちゃんを先頭に\n 荒野の集落まで みんなで行って:
With Theodore and the young master leading us,
we headed for the settlement. It was quite
the commotion!

10431.「グハハハハハ！\n あんときゃ 人間たちが 先手を打って\n 攻め込んできたの:
Hahahahahahaha! I'd really thought the humans
made the first move to attack us!

10432.「それで俺は エルジュに 継承の儀を\n してやったんだが そこから先に\n 根:
I gave Erju the ceremony, and that was when he
really showed his true character and
determination.

10433.「破邪舟師の血は 伊達じゃないってところを\n 見せてもらった。ベルンハルトのや:
I got to see that a descendant of a Ship
Shaper wasn't so bad. I'm sure Bernhart's son
is more than happy to be in the sky!

10434.「お別れを言いに 参りました。\n 私たちエルフは エルトナ大陸へ戻ります。\n:
I've come to say goodbye. The Elves will all
be returning to Eltona. I hope that we can
meet again sometime, <cs_pchero>.

10435.「海に沈んだ太陽 レイダメテス。\n あの正体が なんであったのかは\n 私にも:
Reidametes, the sun set in the sea... I am
also not sure of its true purpose.

10436.「ただ……大いなる闇が 見えます。\n これは まだ終わりではなく 始まり……。:
All I see is... a great darkness. This is not
the end, but the beginning... I can't help
but feel that way.

10437.「私も プクランド大陸に戻る。\n キミたちのことは 詩に残し 語り継ごう。\n:
I'll also be returning to Pukuland. Your story
will become my poem, and echo through the
decades and centuries to come...

10438.「なぜだろうな。<cs_pchero>……\n キミとは 不思議な運命を 感じる:
It's strange, <cs_pchero>... I
feel a mysterious fate with you. I have a
strong feeling we'll meet again somewhere.

10439.「<cs_pchero>。話したいことが あるんだ。\n 後で ボクの部屋まで来:
I need to speak with you. Please come to my
room when you can.

10440.「父さん……。父さんのカタキは\n <pc>が 果たしてくれたよ……。:
Father... <pc> was able to fulfill
your wishes...

10441.「な なんだよ <pc>。\n もう 来てたのか。……ちぇっ。\n イヤなとこ:
H-hey, what the heck, <pc>... I
didn't know you were already here.
...Ugh. I didn't want you to see that...

10442.「まあ いいや。<pc>……\n 改めて お礼を言わせてくれ。\n 本当に あり:
Well, whatever...
I wanted to thank you again.
Thank you so much, really...

10443.「ボクは これまで 誇りという言葉の意味を\n 理解していなかった気がするんだ。:
I feel like I didn't truly understand the
meaning of the word "pride" until now.

10444.「本当の誇りとは 頭を下げて\n 失われるようなものじゃない。\n 人に笑われて:
True pride isn't something you just lose by
bowing down to someone...nor is it something
that can be hurt by ridicule from others.

10445.「誇りとは 何かを信じ通すチカラなんだ。: Pride is the power to believe in something.

10446.「ボクは <pc>を信じたから\n 何も怖くなかった。頭を下げることも\n 人に:
When I believed in you, I wasn't afraid
anymore. I didn't care if I bowed my head or
if I was laughed at.

10447.「なあ <pc>。破邪舟の術を\n 途絶えさせないようにしてほしいと\n 言って:
Oh, that's right. You asked me to make sure
the Sacred Ship's art was successfully
passed down, didn't you?

10448.「いつかは 疑ってしまったけど\n 今は 信じるよ。君が ５００年先の\n 未来:
I doubted it at first, but now I'm sure of it.
You really are from 500 years in the future.

10449.「これは終わりではなく 始まり……。\n エルフの ヤクルは そう言っていた。:
It's just as Yakuru said... "This is not the
end, but the beginning..."

10450.「君の生きる時代……\n ５００年後の世界で 破邪舟の術が必要になる\n 何かが:
500 years from now, in your time... something
happens that will require someone who can use
the Sacred Ship, right?

10451.「約束するよ。\n 破邪舟の術は 子々孫々まで受け継いで\n 必ず 君の時代へ:
I promise to you... that art will be passed
down and will make it to your time. I
will make sure of it.

10452.「……そのかわり <pc>も約束しろ。: In return, I want you to promise me, too.

10453.「たとえ 生きる時代が 違っていても\n 君とボクは ずっと友達だ！:
Even though we live in different eras, you and
I will always be friends!

10457.「そのジョイフルかつ ハートフルな顔……。\n 過去では うまくやったようじゃの:
Aye! yer face is full o' joy! Sounds like ya
done well in the past! Will ya tell me all
about it?

10458.「……そうか。ひどい災厄の混乱の中\n エルジュという 破邪舟使いの少年が\n:
Aye... In the chaos of that terrible disaster,
a lad named Erju, a Sacred Sailor, was
strugglin' to inherit the art.

10459.「そこで 術の継承を手助けし\n 破邪舟を 現代まで 途絶えさせないよう\n そ:
So ya promised the lad to help him inherit
it and keep the Sacred Ship alive 'til
this here present day.

10460.<if_woman>「ホッホッホッホ！ ついでに\n 災厄の源を 海に落としてき:
Ho-ho-ho! And ya also dropped
that big ol' calamity into the sea.
Yer a <if_woman>lass<else>lad<endif> to be reckoned with!

10461.「よし。とにかく これで\n 破邪舟の術が 復活しているかもしれん。:
Good. Hopefully, this will bring back that
Sacred Ship art.

10462.「さっそく 破邪舟使いの末裔を訪ね\n おぬしと少年の約束どおり 術が継承された:
Ya should visit the descendant of the Sacred
Sailor and see if the art has been passed
down as ya promised each other.

10463.「よもや 忘れておるまいな？\n 破邪舟使いの末裔は グレン城の城下町に住む\n:
Ya haven't forgotten, have ya? That
descendant is a woman named Fluka who lives
in Glen Castle Town.

10465.「水が ほしいだと？\n お前は たしか <pc>であったな。\n かまわんとも:
You need some water? You're
<pc>, right? That's fine with me.
Please wait for a moment.

10467.「お前は 新入りと聞いている。\n 特別に ツボいっぱいの水をやろう。:
I hear that you're new around these parts.
I'll give you a special pot all filled up.

10468.「ひとりには 充分すぎる量だ。\n 誰か 困っている者がいたら\n 分けてやると:
It's more than enough for a single person. If
anyone else needs it, you can share it.

12213.「ふむ。ちょうど グレン城下町駅に着くわい。\n それでは <pc>。\n フル:
Hmm, we're just about ta arrive at the Glen
station. See ya soon! I'll meet ya at Fluka's
place!

12214.「間もなく～ グレン城～ グレン城～。\n 箱舟から お降りの際は 押し合わず～:
We will soon be arriving at Glen Castle.
Please do not push or shove when exiting.
Please exit in an orderly fashion.

22632.「はぁはぁ…… くそっ！\n ランドンクイナめ……。\n おとなしく ボクに は:
Huff... huff... Cursed Apeckalypse... Just
give me the damn feather already...!

24467.「神殿レイダメテスは 地上を焼き尽くし\n すでに充分な量の 死者の魂を吸収した:
Reidametes Temple has scorched the land and
absorbed a sufficient number of souls of the
dead...

41420.「ヤツが 迫っているぞーっ！\n 皆 ただちに 屋内に退避しろ！！: It's coming! Everyone! Get inside, now!!

41421.「シオドーアを説得するなんて\n どうせ できっこない。\n ボクらだけで レイ:
Theodore is beyond convincing. We'll have to
go to Reidametes on our own.

47778.「お待ちしておりました\n エテーネの民 <pc>様。\n わたくしの名は 時の:
I have been waiting for you,
<pc> of Ethene. I am Zebes, the
Conductor of Time.

47779.「もとの時代へ お戻りになりたい時は\n いつでも わたくしに 声をおかけくださ:
Whenever you wish to return to your time,
please do not hesitate to ask me.

47780.「それでは どうぞ\n お気をつけて いってらっしゃいませ。: Please take care, and have a safe journey.
